items.sentence: What did you make with that piece of material that I gave you?
By the time Tom got to the post office, it was already closed.
After Tom started studying grammar, his French improved a lot.
I think that we're going to have trouble meeting the deadline.
Tom wasn't able to get into the university he wanted to go to.
How could you not know what was going on between Tom and Mary?
There was an earthquake and, in addition, there was a tsunami.
Between you and me, Tom's idea doesn't appeal to me very much.
The teacher was worried by Tom's frequent absences from class.
I'm fairly certain that Tom is the only one who won't do that.
